info.task: read information about collapsed accordion header
info.title: Read information about a collapsed accordion header in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnAndCollapseFirstAccordionHeader
setupScript.description: collapses and sets focus on the 'Personal Information' accordion header

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Personal Information' accordion header, read information about the accordion header.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Personal Information' accordion header, read information about the accordion header.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.
